annonstext:
Founded in 1872, Pirelli is among the main tyre makers globally, leader in the Premium segment with high technological content. With a commercial presence in over 160 countries, the company has 20 manufacturing facilities on four continents and 36,000+ employees.

Pirelli recognizes the centrality of its human resources, in the firm belief that the key success factor of any company lies in the professional contribution of its people, all across the globe. We are now looking for a Controlling Intern to strengthen Controlling team. In the role, you will work closely with the business lending team and be part of the controlling team. It is a summer internship up to 6 months, available for immediate start.

Candidates must have already valid working visa and based in Stockholm.

We are excited to meet enthusiastic and committed candidates who are also true team players and in addition are motivated to contribute to the business success. If you are looking for a position that helps form base for your career, Apply now.

What Will you Learn

	Financial Controlling
	Financial Reporting
	Analysing large sets of data on Excel
	Handling sensitive information in a confidential manner
	How to collaborate with teams spread across the Globe
	Exposure to thinking / working style of a CFO & Management teams

Who are you?

	You have a Masters/ bachelors degree or still studying in Accounting, Finance, or a related field, or an equivalent combination of education, training and experience.
	Demonstrate intermediate to advanced skills and knowledge of Excel, as well as other Microsoft Office applications
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
	Team Spirit
	High level of Energy and dedication to meet deadlines
	Detail-oriented

We Will Appreciate But We Don't Require

	Relevant IFRS knowledge on accounting, budgeting and forecasting
	Experience with Macro and VBA is a big plus
	Data warehousing experience a big plus
	SAP FI and CO modules hands-on working experience

We Offer

	Base salary
	Interesting challenges and opportunities in a fast growing, international, publicly traded company.
	A pleasant and stimulating work environment with our highly competent and dynamic multinational team.

Why join Pirelli? Joining Pirelli FIRSTNAME LASTNAME

	We actively strive to create the right environment and provide the right tools for our employees to enjoy their work and to thrive.
	feel that we believe in the development of our employees through training, education and by providing conditions which lead to increased productivity, motivation, performance and engagement
	join a fast and growing international company
	enjoy a friendly and collaborative atmosphere with supportive teams in a fun startup-like culture
	have fun at work.

To apply

Send your application by e-mail including CV and letter in English, to  EMAIL , no later than March 12, 2021. The position can be filled before this date.

For any questions you are welcome to contact CFO Özgur Burcoglu,  EMAIL
